hibernate-mapping.query: select new vw_denomultidto ( vw_multideno.tlf_eno, vw_multideno.groupno, vw_multideno.actype, vw_multideno.amount, vw_multideno.userno, vw_multideno.Income, vw_multideno.Commucharge, vw_multideno.counterno) from TLMVIW00D14 as vw_multideno where Convert(char(10),vw_multideno.CASHDATE,111) = Convert(char(10),:cashdate,111) and vw_multideno.SourceBr = :sourcebr and vw_multideno.cur = :cur and vw_multideno.Reverse = false and vw_multideno.reverse_status = false and vw_multideno.groupno like 'G%' order by vw_multideno.groupno asc , vw_multideno.Income asc

select new vw_denomultidto ( vw_multideno.tlf_eno, vw_multideno.groupno, vw_multideno.actype, vw_multideno.amount, vw_multideno.userno, vw_multideno.Income, vw_multideno.Commucharge, vw_multideno.counterno) from TLMVIW00D14 as vw_multideno where Convert(char(10),vw_multideno.CASHDATE,111) = Convert(char(10),:cashdate,111) and vw_multideno.SourceBr = :sourcebr and vw_multideno.cur = :cur and vw_multideno.Reverse = false and vw_multideno.reverse_status = false and vw_multideno.groupno like 'G%' and vw_multideno.counterno = :counterno order by vw_multideno.groupno asc , vw_multideno.Income asc
